= Introduction =

This page contains instructions on how to build [http://hoxchess.googlecode.com/ hoxchess] the binaries files based on the *latest* version of the source code.
The page's content is solely based on my experience working on the project.


= Requirements =
Starting from the version 0.0.2.0, the project can run under Windows and Linux, thanks to the cross platform portability of [http://www.wxwidgets.org wxWidgets].

== Under Windows ==
  * Windows XP or Vista.
  * Visual C++ 2005 Express Edition.

== Under Linux ==
  * Centos 4.5 using Eclipse CDT 3.3, or
  * Ubuntu 7.10 using [http://www.kdevelop.org KDevelop] 3.5 (as an Automake based project).
